codeProjects.title: Codenames
codeProjects.description: An online multiplayer version of the board game Codenames, built with Node.js/Express.js on the backend, a MongoDB database and HTML/CSS/Javascript on the frontend. Github repo lives here: https://github.com/davidnlearner/codenames

codeProjects.title: Fractal Generator
codeProjects.description: A webapp that draws fractals, which users can manipulate through various attributes. Programmed with Javascript, HTML Canvas, and React.js. Github repo lives here: https://github.com/davidnlearner/fractal-visualizer

codeProjects.title: Weather App
codeProjects.description: Basic Weather App made using Node.js/Express.js and using data from the WeatherStack and Mapbox APIs
